description: Optimize a TrueSignal rule by rewriting it into its most compact, testable, and behaviorally specific form, while preserving intent. All optimization must conform to the structure and criteria defined in internal/standards/rule_text_validation.json.

input.description: A single TrueSignal rule in raw text form to be optimized.

preconditions.description: The rule must be classified as VALID by the current validation standard before it can be optimized.

steps.description: Preserve the behavioral intent and scope of the original rule. No substantive behavior should be lost, added, or changed.
Rewrite the rule to be more concise, without losing specificity or enforceability.
Ensure the rule follows the structural expectations defined in the standard, including the presence of a condition, behavior, and enforcement (if applicable).
Simplify language to eliminate redundancy, remove filler, and enhance enforceability, clarity, and isolation.
Ensure the optimized rule meets all criteria for VALID classification in internal/standards/rule_text_validation.json.

output.description: The output includes the optimized rule and a summary of the modifications, along with an audit statement verifying that it conforms to the standard.
